quoteText: Whenever you interact with our Website or Software using your browser or device, we automatically receive and record information in our server logs, which may include your IP address, device identification, “cookie” information, system and display information, and the type of browser and/or device on which you’re using or accessing our Website or Software.
title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

tosdr.case: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time
